{"step_by_step_thinking": "First, I need to understand what confined placental mosaicism (CPM) is. This can occur in both IVF and spontaneous pregnancies. Now, I need to determine if CPM is associated with adverse perinatal outcomes in IVF pregnancies. Document [0] states that the incidence of CPM is not increased in IVF/ICSI pregnancies compared with spontaneous conceptions and probably does not account for the adverse perinatal outcomes following IVF/ICSI.
